titles.title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Science and Technology
House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 11/19/2009--Passed House without amendment. Elects named Majority Members to the House Committees on: (1) Armed Services; (2) Homeland Security; (3) Science and Technology; and (4) Transportation and Infrastructure.
